name: ballistics

the study of objects that are shot or thrown through the air, such as a bullet from a gun: His team includes a mapping expert and a specialist in ballistics. He is a ballistics expert at the FBI lab in Quantico. Ballistics tests indicated that all three victims were killed by bullets fired from the same gun. Related words
